page.title: 18CLUBS
page.content: Most villages have their own {Brownie}and{Cub}groups which have about 24 in each .They meet once a week in the local scout hut .During an evening the groups play games, sing, make things, work for badges and go for walks.They are all under 11 years. There is a{Hospice Support Group}in this area which has raised Â£2000 during the first year.The Hospice will cost Â£150,000 and will be built on the sight of the old Albert Infirmary near Winsford. {Shavington Social Club}has existed for about 60 years and has about 700- 800 members .It is run by a committee. It sells many kinds of beer and crisps.People use this local club as it provides family entertainment, especially on Saturday nights.There is a sports room,bingo,entertaiment & T.V {BY CATHERINE,PAUL,PETER,STEVEN & DONNA
